title: SoC COMM_ST 395-0-24 Topics in Communication Studies

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course will examine the impact, both positive and negative, that digital technology has on communication across development. This course will provide an overview of the complex ways in which children and adolescent engage in interpersonal communication with peers and family members as well as the interactions that children have with, through, and in the context of media technology.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Turkle, S. (2015). Reclaiming Conversation: The Power of Talk in a Digital Age. Penguin Press: New York, NY.
